mapper.select: select ord_idx, prd_title, prd_price, ord_tot_price, ord_amount, mem_id, ord_recp_name, ord_date, ord_state, mem_name from (select o.ord_idx, p.prd_title, p.prd_price, o.ord_tot_price, d.ord_amount, o.mem_id, o.ord_recp_name, o.ord_date, o.ord_state, p.prd_company, m.mem_name, row_number() over(order by o.ord_idx desc) o_seq from order_tb o inner join ord_detail_tb d on o.ord_idx = d.ord_idx inner join product_tb p on p.prd_idx = d.prd_idx inner join member_tb m on m.mem_id = o.mem_id order by o.ord_idx desc, d.prd_idx desc ) where o_seq between #{rowStart} and #{rowEnd}
select count(o.ord_idx) from order_tb o inner join ord_detail_tb d on o.ord_idx = d.ord_idx inner join product_tb p on p.prd_idx = d.prd_idx
select count(p.prd_idx) from order_tb o inner join ord_detail_tb d on o.ord_idx = d.ord_idx inner join product_tb p on p.prd_idx = d.prd_idx where o.ord_idx = #{ord_idx}
mapper.update: update order_tb set ord_state=#{ord_state} where ord_idx = #{ord_idx}
mapper.select: select o.ord_idx, o.ord_state, d.prd_idx, d.ord_amount, p.prd_title, p.prd_price, p.prd_dc_price, m.mem_id, m.mem_name, m.mem_tel, m.mem_email, o.ord_tot_price, o.ord_date, o.ord_recp_name, o.ord_recp_tel, o.ord_recp_zip, o.ord_recp_addr, o.ord_recp_addr_d from order_tb o inner join ord_detail_tb d on o.ord_idx = d.ord_idx inner join product_tb p on p.prd_idx = d.prd_idx inner join member_tb m on m.mem_id = o.mem_id where d.ord_idx=#{ord_idx} order by d.prd_idx desc
